Sentencas: Direct internal CO2 reforming of methane was carried out on the anode of a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), which was composed of Ni-yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ)/YSZ/La0.6Sr0.4MnO3.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of SOFC with internal CO2 reforming of methane

Sentencas: I-V characteristics of SOFC were found to be basically similar to those obtained in internal steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of SOFC with internal CO2 reforming of methane

Sentencas: At CO2/CH4 = 2.6 or higher, a stable voltage output was obtained without coke formation.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of SOFC with internal CO2 reforming of methane

Sentencas: The equilibrium open circuit voltage (OCV) for steam reforming of methane was expected to be slightly higher than that fur CO2 reforming of methane at the same ratio of CO2/CH4 and H2O/CH4, whereas higher OCV was observed for CO2 reforming than for steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of SOFC with internal CO2 reforming of methane

Sentencas: The reason should be ascribed tu the non-equilibrium states of the reaction gas mixture due to deficient amount of the Ni catalyst.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of SOFC with internal CO2 reforming of methane

Sentencas: CO2 reforming of methane is another suitable way to generate electrical power from methane fueled SOFC.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of SOFC with internal CO2 reforming of methane
